properties.Description: The Prometheus rule group properties of the resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

description.Description: the description of the Prometheus rule group that will be included in the alert email.

enabled.Description: the flag that indicates whether the Prometheus rule group is enabled.

clusterName.Description: the cluster name of the rule group evaluation.

scopes.Description: the list of resource id's that this rule group is scoped to.

interval.Description: the interval in which to run the Prometheus rule group represented in ISO 8601 duration format. Should be between 1 and 15 minutes

rules.Description: defines the rules in the Prometheus rule group.

record.Description: the name of the recording rule.

alert.Description: the name of the alert rule.

enabled.Description: the flag that indicates whether the Prometheus rule is enabled.

expression.Description: the expression to run for the rule.

severity.Description: the severity of the alerts fired by the rule. Only relevant for alerts.

for.Description: the amount of time alert must be active before firing. Only relevant for alerts.

labels.Description: labels for rule group. Only relevant for alerts.

annotations.Description: annotations for rule group. Only relevant for alerts.

actions.Description: The array of actions that are performed when the alert rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved. Only relevant for alerts.

resolveConfiguration.Description: defines the configuration for resolving fired alerts. Only relevant for alerts.

actionGroupId.Description: The resource id of the action group to use.

actionProperties.Description: The properties of an action group object.

autoResolved.Description: the flag that indicates whether or not to auto resolve a fired alert.

timeToResolve.Description: the duration a rule must evaluate as healthy before the fired alert is automatically resolved represented in ISO 8601 duration format. Should be between 1 and 15 minutes

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)
